text: Slash Records is a record label in Los Angeles. It started out producing local punk rock bands. The label was sold to London Records in 1986. ==Notable artists== *The Blasters *The BoDeans *Burning Spear *Dream Syndicate *Failure *Faith No More *Fear *Field Trip *GRADUATION DAY *Green on Red *Gun Club *Gun Bunnies *Imperial Teen *L7 *Los Lobos *Plugz *Rammstein *Soul Coughing *Steel Pole Bath Tub *The Germs *Tribe *The Misfits *Violent Femmes *X ==Related pages== *List of record labels Category:American record labels Category:Companies based in Los Angeles
title: Slash Records
